CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 30, 1958, pg. 32 reads: "Medalist Winner - Cleveland's Bob Turner, right, amateur medalist winner in UGA gold tourney, takes a firm hold on the club he hopes will carry him to the amateur championship. Trying to snatch it away are, left to right: Jerry Sumpter, Pittsburgh, defeated in the first round; Ray Boots of Washington, D.C., and Dr. Remus Robinson, Detroit."
TitMainTitle: Group of golfers, left to right; Jerry Sumpter, Ray Boots, and Dr. Remus Robinson, pulling golf club away from Bob Turner, standing on North Park golf course for UGA tournament
